explains: n. 耻辱，不光彩； 令人感到羞耻的人（或事），不名誉的事；失宠
v. 使丢脸，使蒙受耻辱；使名誉扫地，使失势
wordGroup: in disgrace 很不讨人喜欢

sentences.en: There is no disgrace in being poor.
Sam was in disgrace with his parents.
sentences.cn: 萨姆已失宠于他的父母。

sentences.en: The state of our roads is a national disgrace.
sentences.cn: 我们的道路状况是国家的耻辱。
